DataElement.preferredName: Vital Signs Record Unique Record Link Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes.:Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A set of characters used as a code that is unique in the context or the system for which it is created. It serves as a means of identification and reference (often instead of a name) for an entity, person, thing, function, procedure, activity, variable, or body of data.:A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
